# Decisions

**Purpose**: Architecture Decision Records (ADRs)

## Format

```
ADR-[NUMBER]-[short-title].md
```

## Template

```markdown
# ADR-XXX: [Title]

**Date**: YYYY-MM-DD
**Status**: Proposed | Accepted | Deprecated

## Context
[Why this decision is needed]

## Decision
[What we decided]

## Consequences
[What happens as a result]
```
